amendatorysection.catchline: Committee; adopt rules and regulations; forms and materials; provide.
amendatorysection.para: The committee may, subject to the approval of the commission, adopt and promulgate rules and regulations prescribing the procedures to be followed in the filing of applications and proceedings under the Nebraska Crime Victim's Reparations Act and any other matters the committee considers appropriate, including special circumstances, such as when expenses of job retraining or similar employment-related rehabilitative services are involved, under which an award from the Victim's Compensation Fund may exceed ten thousand dollars. The committee shall make available all forms and educational materials necessary to promote the existence of the programs to persons throughout the state.
